alert.note: Alert for Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:13PM EDT until June 25 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wood County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 612 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holgate, or 12 miles south of Napoleon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Fostoria, North Baltimore, Weston, Pemberville, Haskins, Luckey, Bradner, Grand Rapids, Wayne, Bloomdale, Risingsun, Cygnet, Portage, Jerry City, Tontogany, Hoytville, Custar, West Millgrove and Milton Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio.
